@EmilyRoads_ @EdenFisher @NFUtweets @Minette_Batters @Farmer_Tom_UK @NFUEducation Totally. @Minette_Batters has been doing sterling work here - completely inspirational, and by the look of it working around the clock to create a bright future for us all! #FutureFarming #BackBritishFarming

@EmilyRoads_ @EdenFisher @NFUtweets @Minette_Batters Agreed. We also need confident ambassadors for our community - too often farmers are unfairly blamed, and there’s too little understanding in urban communities- a gap which initiatives like @Farmer_Tom_UK’s FaceTime a Farmer & @NFUEducation’s Farmvention are working to bridge.

@EdenFisher @EmilyRoads_ @NFUtweets @Minette_Batters Or maybe she’s asking the next gen to be brave enough to take up the succession challenge? There are big changes coming to farming with the next raft of tech (including yours truly!) which will hopefully help with long hours while making it more creative, changing what’s possible
